channel.title: Fallout MMO
channel.description:
AKA Project V13 is now [url='https://www.fallout-on-line.com/']accepting beta signups[/url]
why are you still here, go grab your beta
--- [url='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Project_V13']Info on the game[/url]

item.title: Fallout MMO
item.dc:creator: Spooboy
item.description:
Cool

Should be good…but who knows, could be another Star Trek Online.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout MMO
item.dc:creator: Bobikan00sh
item.description:
p0rt1r:

it took me like 3 minutes, you would just happen to have very fast internet, or you got lucky… wait a minute, you actually think that the browser has that much of a difference over your internet, your hdd, cpu, ram and gpu’s ability to process information being recieved over the internet? Kmon u must’ve wondered why your computer loads different websites at different speeds?

lol. i wasnt really thinking when i wrote that post. i was too excited about more fallout:retard:

Read full topic

Bethesda owns the intellectual rights to the Fallout name, but Interplay is still making the game.

I FERGOT:retard:

item.title: Fallout MMO
item.dc:creator: p0rt1r
item.description:
Bobikan00sh:

if you guys have it use Google chrome

loads fast as hell. took 12 seconds at most.

it took me like 3 minutes, you would just happen to have very fast internet, or you got lucky… wait a minute, you actually think that the browser has that much of a difference over your internet, your hdd, cpu, ram and gpu’s ability to process information being recieved over the internet? Kmon u must’ve wondered why your computer loads different websites at different speeds?

item.title: Fallout MMO
item.dc:creator: Ry_amp_955_n
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

I hope Bethesda is working on TES 5.

elder scrolls > fallout any day.

^Agreed. With the Fallout3 Limb/Gib/Gore system integrated into the TES 5 game.

No Vats though. Srsly.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout MMO
item.dc:creator: Door
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

I hope Bethesda is working on TES 5.

elder scrolls > fallout any day.

I’d want a TES5, but the original fallout games are awesome, and have awesome animations; something all Bethesda games lack and therefore it’s better than TES. :3

item.title: Fallout MMO
item.dc:creator: p0rt1r
item.description:
fallout-on-line.com, woulda thought they could’ve gotten a better domain name. b4 i looked up the owner i swore it was a fake, but its apparently owned by interplay

https://www.sitereport.org/p/fallout-on-line.com

if its first in first served then theres a high chance were getting us beta keys

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout MMO
item.dc:creator: Jnacool
item.description:
As far as I know they are not planning a retail launch until 2012.(Can’t remember the source for that fact sadly) I can’t say I have been following this game too much but I have read the occasional news article so I am suprised they have started any kind of Beta (or Alpha) at this point.

My guess is they are just trying to drum up some intrest before a beta launch later this year maybe? Anyway I have submitted a beta request hopefully it will come along sooner rather than later.

Thank for the heads up OP

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout MMO
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
Deimos:

I’m still here because the site takes way too long to load up.

^This

Charchar:

Yeah, I can’t grab it if the webpage doesn’t load

^ Aaaand this

[edit] The “One moment, please, while we redirect you” brings irony to a new level. About 5 mins and connection timeout thereafter. :aah:

item.title: Fallout MMO
item.dc:creator: eXpressionist
item.description:
Oh jeez… Download already fails six times (3 of them by the ISP failures). Now this site looks like fake for me.
That’s 8 fails already. And now just button “Get Flash” instead of intro.swf (actually, I have last version of Adobe Flash).
